title: Alice102030
author: Alice102030
content: Hello, I can provide support to online betting sites abroad in the Turkish market.- Advertising Attracting Members - Youtube Live Broadcast- Turkish Site Development - I Can Do Advertising and Member Recruitment in addition to Turkey Income. Kind regards.- Dealing with Advertising in Turkey-Becoming a Customer Representative in the Turkish MarketWe Can Talk About Details.Best Regards.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: This thread is best suited to the service board and not the gambling board,  so I advise you to move the thread to the appropriate board,  seeking for service doesn't belong here. And from the look of thing,  many potential client's may have a bad feelings towards dealing with you deu to your red trust flags,  so you may need to work more on your reputations before you be fully ready to take up any offers in other to guarantee your customers satisfaction.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: You have shifted from asking for non-colateral loan to simple-to-know scam on something related to gambling. Stop wasting your effort, there is no one to scam on this forum. You can go to other online forum to see if you will be able to scam them or not.Even if your account has no trust feedback, no one will do a business with a new account that can easily lead to scam.

comments.author: Alice102030
comments.body: My Stupid Dumb BrotherI asked for my money ? , I told him that I could help him with his work, my idiot brother, get out from under that coward Anonymous, show yourself, you can find me on my profile, warbler.

comments.author: Wapfika
comments.body: I commend the courage on an announcing your service offer here using your account with negative feedback while you can create new account to start with fresh account.  Just like @Oshondy stated, no one will gonnna hire with just sweet word of your offer because your account is newbie unless you can provide a valid portfolio that will show good result for your previous service done with other customer. I believe it’s still allowed to maintain this thread on gambling board since it’s an offer specifically for casino service.

comments.author: Alice102030
comments.body: Recruitment May or May Not Be Made. You know that we can get rewards after the work done, right?

comments.author: Text
comments.body: Quote from: Alice102030 on September 25, 2023, 05:14:45 PMDo not become a new member to this site. Friends, bitcointalk is now cool. Let it continue among people who do not know themselves. The community that accuses everything of fraud is doomed to lose. This Site is Over for Me, You Keep It Up, NEW USERS WILL NEVER GET MERIT AND WILL ALWAYS BE THE FAVORITE OF SCAMMERS. DICK HEAD MEMBERSHey, their intention is not to ruin the site for new users; they are just expressing concerns about your credibility due to negative feedback on your account. This might make potential clients hesitant to work with you. There are accusations of potential scams and warnings to stay away from your offers.I would also advise online betting sites to be cautious about working with you. It's a matter of legitimacy. You appear to be aggressive and unprofessional, which creates a hostile environment.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: As everyone said that your have negative feedback on your profile which clients don't like and that's why it will be hard for you to get any clients at all. You should have to accept criticism because you asked for non-collateral loan in lending board without proper knowledge and that's the reason that you got those negative tags on your profile. No one is against you or other newbies and if you think that newbies are unaccepted in this forum then you're wrong my friend. Those newbies who contribute good information to the forum are highly appreciated by reputed members of the forum in the form of merits, and after a certain level of activity and merits they will grow into ranked members. The forum is open for everyone and it's a person own actions that could make things good or bad for him/her.

Such things will not make him to move well and go further in the forum and he himself has seen it yet he does not want to give up.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: I'm not sure if this is supposed to be the right board for this post but since it is already gambling related,  I would say it is fine over here so as to get the attention for the right persons.I wouldn't have to point  fingers at you or call your names because I do understand  how things work and I hope that your intentions are genuine and I also checked your profile and it already has red tags and that's a red flag for potential customers, so I would advice that you try to work on your reputation before offering any tangible service and always try to use escrow to boost your clients confidence in your service.

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: Ojima-ojo on September 25, 2023, 11:07:20 PMQuote from: Alice102030 on September 25, 2023, 05:14:45 PMNEW USERS WILL NEVER GET MERIT AND WILL ALWAYS BE THE FAVORITE OF SCAMMERS. DICK HEAD MEMBERSThis is not true, i I am a new member and i I have received the highest merit trencehold (wrong word here )when i I was a newbie with zero knowledge,  so i I may not accept that statemntthat statement that new members does do not receive merits.Unless If new members have poor quality, Reputation (capitalization not needed) or accusations against them, thise those in that category may fine find things hard as regards to merits with respect to earning merits and growth in the forum,. This forum is a discussion forum, so just be yourself and never listen to anybody.OK, I know this thread isn't a discussion about merits, but I didn't derail it and since I was doing a post history review for you (Ojima-ojo), I'd like to suggest that you improve your English writing skills a bit....and certainly before bragging about earning a bunch of merits as a newbie.  When I read the above post closely and decided to make corrections to it to give you a little help, I found that some of it actually doesn't help (like "be yourself and don't listen to anybody").  Hopefully you'll see this and listen to me.
